description: This file defines the HomeFragment class, a subclass of Fragment, responsible for displaying the main product listing page in the Shopease mobile app. It inflates the layout resource 'fragment_home' when the fragment view is created.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays the main product listing page for Shopease, inflating the 'fragment_home' layout.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Overrides Fragment's onCreateView to inflate and return the fragment's layout view.
